channel.title: How can i make a portal to a older place?
channel.description: So, like i make portal and it tele me to my fun pk area how can i make that ?

Like

in your client class…

        switch (objectID) {

item.source: How can i make a portal to a older place?

item.title: How can i make a portal to a older place?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“x pk3r xx, post:2, topic:238747”]search for makeGlobalObject in your client.java add in there:
makeGlobalObject([X coord], [Y coord], [Obj ID], [direction (mostly 0 or -1)], [height(mostly 10)]);
than u placed the portal.

than add somewere in client.java:
case 2468: // pkportal
teleportToX = 3244;
teleportToY = 3519;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Teampk.”);
break;

case 2468 <<< 2468 = the portal ID

that should do it.[/quote]

You can’t add that anywhere in the client class…

you have to add it in a defined switch.

in this case probably objectID switch.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make a portal to a older place?

item.title: How can i make a portal to a older place?
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

search for makeGlobalObject in your client.java add in there:
makeGlobalObject([X coord], [Y coord], [Obj ID], [direction (mostly 0 or -1)], [height(mostly 10)]);
than u placed the portal.

than add somewere in client.java:
case 2468: // pkportal
teleportToX = 3244;
teleportToY = 3519;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Teampk.”);
break;

case 2468 <<< 2468 = the portal ID

that should do it.
